name: @tremho/locale-string-tables
description: ###### Foundational code for i18n locale based string table lookup

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run compile && tap ./build/test/*.test.js
scripts.test-direct: npm run clean && npm run compile && node build/test/api.test.js
scripts.doc: npm run clean && npm run compile && inchjs && cd build; tsccd ./; documentation readme --readme-file ../README.md --markdown-toc false --section API src

author: tremho
